Title: People's Daily (Red Flag) Magazine Editorial-January 12, 1967. Resolutely oppose economism and completely crush the new counterattack of the bourgeois reactionary line!
Designer: Shandong University "Eight, Eight" Red Flag Fighting Team (山大“八，八” 紅旗战斗队)"Red Tasseled Spear" Caricature Fighting Team (《紅樱枪》漫画战斗組)
